sodium-extra-information.options.local_t: Show the local time on the overlay.
sodium-extra-information.options.word_ti: Displays the time spent in the world(days) in the overlay.
sodium-extra-information.options.session: Show the time you have been in the current session in the overlay.
sodium-extra-information.options.memory_: Show the memory usage on the overlay.
Show a more detailed memory usage on the overlay.
